description: This file defines a React functional component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing the game state and rendering the game board.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current game state.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the player's click on a square, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial configuration.
